meanings.sent1: The dormered house had windows that stuck out from the roof.

meanings.sent3: The dormered roof looked like a little house on top of the big house.
meanings.sent4: Her dormered bedroom felt like a cozy nook in the sky.
meanings.sent5: The dormered design added charm to the otherwise plain building.

meanings.sent5: The dormered architecture gave the building a unique character.
